data.comment: The match has started at São Januario.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos's half?
Santos's Diego Pituca is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 4, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Santos.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Santos.
Important block from the Santos defence as Carlinhos fires in a strike for Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in Santos.
In the minute 8, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Carlinhos scores to make it 1-0 at São Januario.
Leo Matos with an assist there.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Rio de Janeiro Santos attack through Madson. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 14, Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Free kick Santos.
Alison (Santos) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Santos.
In the minute 20, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Santos throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro waits before resuming play because Leandro Castan for Vasco da Gama is still down.
In the minute 24, Madson of Santos is pulled up for offside.
Leandro Castan is back on his feet again.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
In the minute 30, Free kick for Santos in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Santos.
Santos's Alex goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 33, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Santos.
In the minute 36, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Santos are coming forward and Madson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Free kick Santos.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Vasco da Gama have a dangerous throw-in.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santos to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 45, 5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santos close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Santos at São Januario.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at São Januario.
In the minute 45, Jadson for Vasco da Gama has been booked by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro and receives a first yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yeferson Soteldo is on a sub for Luiz Felipe for Santos.
Santos make their second substitution with Bruno Marques replacing Fernando Moraes Pileggi.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 49, Throw-in Santos.
Throw-in for Santos at São Januario.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama close to the penalty box.
In the minute 51, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
In the minute 53, Bruno Marques (Santos) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Bruno Marques for Santos drives towards goal at São Januario. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 55, Leo Matos is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama just outside Santos's area.
Leo Matos has recovered and rejoins the match in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 57, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Diego Pituca for Santos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 58, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santos drives forward and Felipe Jonatan gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 60, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Santos throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
In the minute 65, Free kick Santos.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 68, Gustavo Torres is replacing Vinicius for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Marcelo Alves is replacing Juninho for the home team.
In the minute 69, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Santos in Rio de Janeiro.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, The away team replace Madson with Marinho.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro, Kaio Jorge of Santos is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Santos!
Santos push forward at São Januario and Marinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Vasco da Gama defence.
In the minute 79, Santos are pushing forward but Marinho's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 81, Ricardo Sa Pinto is making the team's third substitution at São Januario with Bruno Gomes replacing Marcos Junior.
Yago Pikachu is on a sub for Carlinhos for Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama needs to be cautious. Santos have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 82, Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Cuca (Santos) is making a fourth substitution, with Marcos Leonardo replacing Kaio Jorge.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Santos in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Marinho of Santos gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lucas Lourenco is replacing Sandry Roberto for the away team.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 87, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
In the minute 89, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Santos's area.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Santos's area.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
At São Januario the fourth official shows that 8 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos close to the penalty box.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Santos throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Santos's Marinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Tiago Reis gets his shot on target but fails to score for Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Santos's Marinho breaks free at São Januario. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Santos.
Santos are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
Vasco da Gama make their fifth substitution with Tiago Reis replacing German Cano.
At São Januario, Henrique Silva for the home team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
